1370: Weitijn moved to Die Camp.B.8 after marriage.
Got married to Waldrada at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Waldrada, Ricward, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Waldrada, Gilis, at age 32.
1374: Had a son with Waldrada, Ingel, at age 33.
Lost son Ricward when Ricward was 5 years old.
1375: Lost son Gilis when Gilis was 3 years old.
1376: Had a son with Waldrada, Gelmarus, at age 35.
Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
